newsitem.title: ROMANIA: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.
newsitem.headline: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.

text.p: * Defeated President Ion Iliescu held his last press conference as head of state to present the achievements of his four-year term.
* The Finance ministry no longer controls price rises since the Competition Council was set up last year as an independent body, the ministry's press office said in a statement.
* The Education Minister Liviu Maior said in his last press conference that he was pleased with reforms achieved in his sector.
* The leader of the Construction workers' union said building workers made up the majority of victims in Romania's labour accidents. He blamed poor equipment and insufficient training.
* Managers of Italian Reggiana soccer club -- bottom of Italy's serie A and without a win all season -- sacked Romanian coach Mircea Lucescu. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
